Reviews.Title: Best android phone
Reviews.Author: RH "RH"
Reviews.Content: User experience is better than all other android phones because it is not loaded with crapware. It is easier to navigate and access the apps on the phone. However the phone seems to get hotter than other phones and I am unsure why? In addition the lack of extra storage and a headset is a untenable.

Reviews.Title: Best smartphone of all
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Miranda
Reviews.Content: I have had many smartphones and this one is great, the best I had. Screen size and resolution (pixel density) are great. Much better than the old iPhone. And everything is flexible and unlocked. This is a real unleashed Android device.Not depending on ANY operator is the best thing. I have 2 GB of music and there is still plenty of space in my phone. The product finishing is very high quality and this is the way to go. I can change SIMs when I travel and change operators without depending on their obscure tactics and terrible customer service. I don't care anymore. No more stupid plans.

Reviews.Title: awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: this phone is better than the nexus 5 on the sole basis that it can get Ubuntu Touch and is still an amazing quad core phone it will do everything you want smoother and faster than anyphone youve owned previous to it

Reviews.Title: Great product and great seller
Reviews.Author: Dwij Ramloul
Reviews.Content: The product was really well preserved and the cover provided was just awesome. Great communication as well. Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Very good price, good old Google product
Reviews.Author: Razvan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, as she was searching for a smartphone which is cheap but does more than calling.Of course, as always, a Nexus phone fits the description.I had no problems with the order and the product.The smartphone came as described, and as it would have come from Google Play Store.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone. LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Andrew Wilson
Reviews.Content: This is a really great phone.User experience is better than all other android phones because it is not loaded with crapware.It is easier to navigate and access the apps on the phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone for an amazing price, the best of the best QUALITY / PRICE . I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone, makes previous phone look like a toy
Reviews.Author: ProCoComputerRepairs
Reviews.Content: Screen size is perfect, white is different, quality of the phone is great, specs are best bang for the buck, and the phone cuts through task like butter.I actually made a video on my youtube channel to see this phone up close, here's the link to my video if anyone wants to check this phone out.http://youtu.be/TnVWq1gThzAgreat phone overall, worth every penny i spent on it.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, crazy prices here
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Igor S"
Reviews.Content: I have a few friends with this phone and they are quite happy with it. It's not a best one out there but it's a best one for a price. I have no idea though why anyone would buy it here for more than you can get it directly from google play now, with 16Gb, for less. ?!

Reviews.Title: Good all around smart phone.
Reviews.Author: Todd E Chandler
Reviews.Content: There probably are better phones out there (like the Galaxy) but this is a very nice piece of engineering. I have been using the nexus4 for nearly a year now and I have no complaints with the phone itself. I've had one lock up where I had to hold power button for 60 sec and plug into charger to get to come back. Otherwise all tickety boo!

Reviews.Title: great smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Tulio Cassaniga Filho
Reviews.Content: It's my second nexus 4. Bought one for me, and this white for my wife. Its a cheap phone with amazing power.

ProductInfo.Name: Google White Nexus 4 Phone Limited Edition 8gb - Unlocked
